name: PAIRS Scoring Query Job
info: Makes the scoring request to PAIRS

name: PAIRS Min-Mean-Max
info:
This subflow requires an input JSON that describes the parameters of the layers, point and temporal span

The request payload is in the form:
{
    "layers": [
        "16100",
        "49440",
        "49252",
        "49257",
        "49304",
        "49313",
        "50453",
        "49310",
        "49311",
        "49250",
        "49296"
    ],
    "refPoint": {
        "lat": "49.080609",
        "lng": "3.961231"
    },
    "startDay": "2018-06-30",
    "endDay": "2018-10-31"
}

name: This subflow gets AOIs polygons
info: Input can be either a array of AOIs, or a member which is itself an array or layerIDs

name: Format URL & save data

info: Convert XML result to an object

name: get colorMap
info: Get the array of color from the object result

name: Get ColorMapId for each layer
info: Split result to make an action per layer
Creates a batch to be able to use the join flow

name: Query Name - Rect
Query name - AOI
Setup Query Layers
This subflow gets full layers details
info: Input can be either a array of layerIDs, or a member which is itself an array or layerIDs

name: Generate Min-Mean-Max query for mutiple layers
Generate query JSON
init 19 Layers
info:
Créer un bug pour la fonction

**Layers :** 

16100 : Ground temperature
16200 : Ground relative humidity
16700 : Average precipitation

49250 : Precip past 24 h
49252 : Relative humidity surface
49257 : Temperature above ground
49296 : Global elevation
49304 : Dew point
49310 : Temperature feels like
49313 : Wind speed
49441 : solar radiation

50453 : Standard deviation of orography
50450 : Soil type 
50456 : Slope of sub grid scale orography 
50463 : Wind Direction
50496 : pH
50497 : Soil organic carbon
50509 : Nitrogen
50511 : Soil classification most probable class


**Non utilisés :**
49311 : UV index 
49432 : Minimum precipitation rate
49433 : Maximum precipitation rate

50447 : High vegetation cover
50498 : Organic carbon density
50449 : Type of high vegetation
